repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

physdesc.extent: .18 cubic feet (19 items in 1 folder and 1 oversize folder)

did.abstract: 19 black and white photographs and display boards, 1911-1937, of the construction of the Celilo Canal, Portland Airport plans, Port of Portland, Crown Willamette Paper Company, Hawley Pulp & Paper COmpany, Coos Bay Shipbuilding Company, and various plants of PGE including: Oregon City, Faraday, Estacada, Bull Run and Oak Grove Plants.

scopecontent.p: 19 black and white photographs and display boards, 1911-1937, of the construction of the Celilo Canal, Portland Airport plans, Port of Portland, Crown Willamette Paper Company, Hawley Pulp & Paper COmpany, Coos Bay Shipbuilding Company, and various plants of PGE including: Oregon City, Faraday, Estacada, Bull Run and Oak Grove Plants. Originals in oversize.

accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library before any reproduction use. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all of the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright owners.

prefercite.p: Robert T. Mannle Photographic Collection, Org. Lot 645, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
